General.Name: Dios Fastigheter AB
General.Description: Diös Fastigheter AB (publ) develops, owns, and rents commercial and residential properties in Sweden. It holds a portfolio of 354 properties and a lettable area of 1,599 thousand sq.m with offices, urban services, and homes. The company was founded in 1921 and is headquartered in Östersund, Sweden.
